definition: هرج haraja i (harj) to he excited, agitated, in commotion II to make (ه s.o.) drunk, befuddle, cloud, fog, blur (ه s.o.’s mind or perceptions); to joke, make fun, jest (في in conversation) هرج harj excitement, agitation, commotion; disorder, muddle, confusion │ هرج ومرج (wa-marj) turmoil, confusion, chaos
